color: purple, light blue, pink, teal, blue, red, dark blue, maroon, black
usage: strength training, floor-based exercises, circuit training, dumbbell push-ups, muscle sculpting and bulking
key_features: Precision hex shape for enhanced ground stability
ai_description: A vibrant collection of hexagonal dumbbells in nine bold colors including purple, teal, pink, and black. Each features clear weight markings (1KG-10KG) with a smooth neoprene coating. The fixed hexagonal design prevents rolling, while the cast-iron core provides balanced weight distribution. The purple 4KG pair prominently displays 'core balance' branding. Dimensions show compact sizing (21cm length) for easy storage. Lifestyle images demonstrate comfortable grip during exercise.
target_audience: males and females for strength training, beginners to advanced users
product_name: Core Balance Dumbbell Pair Hex Weight Neoprene Coated Cast Iron Strength Training
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
